name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Labyrinth Leakage
description:
Dr. Eggman is trying to fill Labyrinth Zone with water using his new water generators, and now Sonic must destroy them!

Move Sonic around the playing field and destroy any water generators that pop up to prevent the water from filling the play area. Try to stay alive for as long as you can without running out of air.

Controls:

Control methodKeyboardXbox 360 ControllerMoveLeft/Right ArrowsLeft Stick/D-PadJumpUp ArrowA ButtonNavigate MenuLeft/Right Arrows Left Stick/D-PadMenu ConfirmSpacebarA Button

This was created for the MFGG Fangame Jam. The theme is "Too much water".

This is both my first project uploaded to Itch.io and the first game I have ever created for a game jam. Obviously it's not fully developed as an idea and contains plenty of bugs, but I'm at least happy to have gained experience throughout it.

One bug you may encounter is that Sonic will get stuck on the edge of a level tile while he is jumping. You can get out of this by moving in the other direction. I have no idea how I can fix this.

Thanks to everyone for playing.
